name: dually
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in two ways, or in a way that has two parts: At the moment, our work is dually funded by the government and by research grants. Her novel was dually inspired by a walk and by a well-loved poem. Related word
dual
More examplesFewer examplesThe company is dually located in London and New York.Treatment for dually diagnosed patients may be difficult. This word can be dually translated as either "science" or "scholarship".Students who are dually enrolled can attend both school and college.I don't think it's really helpful for us to be dually focused.
